text: [music playing]

REMY: (RAPPING) What
up, all my peeps?

It's your best friend Remy
here with all these folks
you've seen on your telly.

We may not be the
stars and heroes,

but time to expose that everyone
knows sidekicks, kicks, kicks

are the secret sauce you need
inside the mix, mix, mix.

If you're like, how's
that lead so cool
and slick, slick, slick?

POLLY: It's because they
got backup from sidekicks.

REMY: Go, Polly!
POLLY: We bring the jokes.

REMY: Jokes.
POLLY: We know how to slay.
REMY: Slay.

POLLY: Our B-storylines
help improve on the A.

When heroes fall down, we'll
be right there because we care.
REMY: Anne, Luz, and Molly--
POLLY: Ah.

REMY: Need Libby,
King, and Polly.
POLLY: Sup.

REMY: Star would be dead--
POLLY: What?

REMY: Without
Marco and PonyHead.
POLLY: Sidekicks!

When things go bad,
you'll be so glad you've
got your boy, Launchpad.

Don't forget, we got a lot
cuties like Rufus and Pascal
and sidekick Hooty.

And someday you'll say
whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa,

whoa, whoa, that sidekick needs
a spinoff show, a spinoff show.

And we'll be flattered but
say, no, no, no, no, no, no,

because we love to
play our part, bro.

That's why we love to
sidekicks, kicks, kicks.

REMY: Scale of 1 to 5, we
all deserve a six, six, six.

POLLY: If you're like, how's
that lead so cool and sick--

REMY: Ah.
POLLY: Sick--

REMY: Tell 'em.
POLLY: Sick.
It's because--

CRICKET: We're just
naturally cool and--

[music stops]
REMY: Cricket?

What are you doing here?
CRICKET: Sorry.
My bad.
I'm sorry, sidekicks.
[music continues]

TOGETHER: (RAPPING) It's
because they appreciate
sidekicks, kicks, sidekicks.
REMY: Mic drop.
